hero.description: I am an undergraduate student at Pertamina University majoring in Computer Science, with a GPA of 3.89 out of 4.00.

about.detail: Strong interest in software development, machine learning, web development, and data science. Experienced in developing applications using Java Swing and PyQt5, as well as web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and frameworks or libraries like Laravel, Next.js, React.js, and Tailwind. Additionally, actively engaged in student organizations and enjoy sharing knowledge as a tutor, which helps develop both technical and leadership skills.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: A snapshot of my growth through hands-on experiences.

step.title: Risk Management Analyst Intern
description: Collect risk data from Pertamina's subsidiaries, clean and manage it for visual analysis.
Design interactive dashboards using Power BI to monitor and analyze risks, integrating multiple data sources for a comprehensive risk profile.
Reports to support management decisions, and provide risk mitigation recommendations.

step.title: Data Structure and Algorithm Practicum Assistant
description: Assisted lecturers in conducting practicum sessions focused on data structure concepts and algorithms using C++, such as linked lists, stacks, queues, etc.
Guided students through practicum assignments and provided feedback to improve their code quality.
Developed and tested practicum modules to ensure alignment with the course curriculum.
Evaluated students practicum results and provided constructive feedback to enhance their programming skills.

step.title: Software Desktop Developer
description: Implementing a responsive and intuitive graphical user interface (GUI) using PyQt5.
Developing a project management system with the .skk format, including automatic data saving and loading.
Creating a data visualization feature using pickle to store and load user-generated plots.
Designing and optimizing QTreeView as a project navigation system, initially hiding local drives.
Resolving issues related to MDI subwindows, including dynamically reloading widgets.
Ensuring efficient integration between the UI components, file management, and data storage.

step.title: Calculus Teaching Mentor
description: /calculus.png

step.title: Samsung Innovation Campus Batch 5
description: Attended various sessions that provided insights into applying AI and ML to solve real-world problems, along with integrating IoT with smart devices.
Gained knowledge of machine learning concepts such as prediction models, classification, and deep learning algorithms, and how to apply them in data-driven projects.
Acquired skills in data processing and developing AI/ML models to create innovative solutions across different fields.
Gained hands-on experience in developing IoT, AI, and ML-based applications, and collaborated with other participants in team projects to tackle relevant technological challenges.

step.title: Basic Programming Practicum Assistant
description: Assisted lecturers in conducting practicum sessions focused on fundamental programming concepts and algorithms using C++.
Guided students through practicum assignments, helping them improve their code quality.
Developed and tested practicum modules to ensure alignment with the curriculum.
Assessed students' practicum results and provided constructive feedback to enhance their programming skills.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my best work and technical expertise

featured.title: DigitalExposome - Mental Wellbeing Classification
featured.description: Predicting a person's mental wellbeing level based on air quality data and their physiological signal collected from wearable devices.

featured.title: UPartner Web
featured.description: A full-stack website that connects lecturers and students for project collaboration, handling the entire development process from requirements gathering and system design to implementation and testing.

featured.title: Productivity Mobile App
featured.description: A simple and beautifully designed productivity application built using Flutter, designed to help users manage daily tasks efficiently.

featured.title: GoGrow - Program List
featured.description: A React-based web app that displays programs or events in a responsive card layout, with each card showing the title, description, date, and location. It uses modular components like `CardProgram` and `ListProgram` for clean and maintainable code.

featured.title: GoGrow - ToDo App
featured.description: A simple Todo application built with React and Vite that allows users to manage their daily task list through a lightweight and responsive interface.

featured.title: Speech Accent Analysis using MFCC
featured.description: Analyzed the speech accents of Universitas Pertamina students from various regions in Indonesia using the Mel Frequency Cepstral Coefficients (MFCC) technique.

featured.title: Anemic Classification
featured.description: This project uses traditional machine learning (Random Forest Classifier) to classify blood smear images into two categories: Anemic and Non-Anemic. The model is trained on image data that has been resized, flattened, and standardized.

featured.title: Dashboard Subsidiary Risk Management Pertamina
featured.description: This dashboard helps PT Pertamina monitor risks systematically, enhance transparency, and make data-driven decisions to prevent losses and ensure business continuity.

featured.title: Money Management System
featured.description: Money Management CSDev is a Laravel-based web application designed to help users manage their personal finances. It allows users to record income and expenses, and provides an intuitive interface to monitor their financial status in real time.

featured.title: Scheduling System
featured.description: This project is a web-based scheduling system where users can log in, add their activities, and view them on a timeline-style calendar. Users can also see other users' schedules, distinguished by different color indicators.

featured.title: Real Madrid static Blog
featured.description: RealMadrid-BLOG is a front-end blog website dedicated to Real Madrid fans. It features a clean, responsive interface where users can view blog posts and explore football-related content.

featured.title: Field and Well Production Benchmarking
featured.description: The Field and Well Production Benchmarking application helps the oil and gas industry optimize production and efficiency through data integration, performance analysis, and intuitive visualization for better decision-making.

meta.title: Alghif Rz | Portfolio
